## Feature Description
A clear and concise description of the problem or opportunity.

## Proposed Solution
A clear and concise description of the desired functionality.

## Alternatives Considered
A clear and concise description of any alternative solutions or features considered.

## Impact
Who will benefit from this feature? How will it improve the project?

## Mockups/Screenshots
If applicable, include screenshots or mockups to help explain your idea.

## Additional Context
Add any other context about the feature request here.
